name: Godinez Gone Wild
description:
Godinez Gone Wild is a 2D-Top Down shooter, with frenetic action and CRAZY bosses in an office notebook and co-workers....a lot of them too!!.  Fast paced 2D shooter With multiple wepons and abilities to get in the game, with a retro or classic run mode where you play the level after level with no restart or secound chances.

Support us at: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/insolit/godinez-gone-wild
Please share and tell us what you think about the demo. We want to make the best game we can for you to enjoy!

Instructions of the game
